text: Wow!  This stuff is full body shake GROSS!!!!  It has a very unnatural gross sweetness and I can't even find words to describe the disgusting mango pineapple flavor.  It sounded so good - two of my favorite flavors and I love tea, but I can't make myself drink another sip of this grossness.  Wish I hadn't been roped in by the lightning deal.  This is going in the trash.  Save your money.
